item.description:
sorry for the late notice, I thought I had posted this here.  so many meetups, so little time ;)

aren't we all a little Irish on St. Patty's Day?  I grew up in St. Patrick's School, and ALL us French girls were Irish on the 17th.  Maybe we can get some green beer and green jello shots...lol. Ok, TMI

not to mention...I just love this band!  and after a Friday night at the "hoe down" I'm gonna have to get the low down, and fire it up with WILDFIRE baby! 

Wildfire plays a great variety of tunes, mostly rock 'n roll from my era...of course I'm only 49 (again).  They start about 9-9:30. there is a $5 cover...don't recall what time.

I'll be there for dinner at 7-7:30, so if you get there before me,  I'll have a reservation for us, under "susan/meetup". 

 In your reply tell me if you're coming for dinner.  I've made a tentative reservation for 10, and will doublecheck later!

Hope to "meetup" with YOU soon!

Top of the day to you,

Susan?

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: ERIN GO BRAH to "Wildfire" at TPs
